tool_description: An API showing all the latest Turkey News around the world
name: Turkey News Live
title: Turkey News Live

api_list.name: Get All News About Turkey
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Turkey from all over the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://turkey-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "turkey-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Individual News From Specific Sources
api_list.description: Get News about Turkey from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://turkey-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "turkey-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://turkey-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "turkey-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
